Armor Specialist: You can maximize the benefits of wearing Armor while reducing or eliminating some of its drawbacks.
Awareness: You are exceptionally good at noticing things and avoiding perilous situations.
Bounty Hunter: You are among the finest Bounty Hunters in the galaxy, relying on the element of surprise and your hunter's instincts to catch your prey.
Brawler: You like to get 'up close and personal' with your enemies and engage them in melee combat.
Camouflage: You learn quickly how to blend in with your environment.
Commando: You use advanced combat tactics to take down enemies quickly, shield your comrades, and endure whatever challenges are thrown your way.
Dark Side Devotee: Your powerful negative emotions allow The Dark Side to flow through you, giving you great power.
Duelist: Through rigorous training and experience, you become one of the greatest swordfighters in the galaxy.
Expert Pilot: The Ace Pilot relies on finely honed instincts and years of pilot training to outmaneuver and destroy enemy Starships.
Force Adept: Force Adepts use The Force to survive on fringe worlds, and they often have signature Force Powers that they use particularly well.
Force Item: You can imbue Weapons and objects with the power of The Force.
Fortune: Many Scoundrels like to gamble with destiny, putting everything on the line and trusting fate (or The Force) to bring them fortune, fame, and success.
Fringer: You're especially skilled at 'getting by' on backwater worlds.
Gunner: Many Starship Gunners are skilled both in and out of the cockpit and are deadly with ranged Weapons of any kind.
Gunslinger: You never travel anywhere without a blaster (or two), and you know how to handle yourself in a gunfight.
Infamy: You are wanted in multiple systems for criminal acts; and your manner of doing business has earned you an unsavory reputation in the criminal underworld.
Influence: One of your greatest strengths is your ability to exert influence over your opponents.
Inspiration: You can often get results out of their friends, allies, and followers that other leaders cannot.
Jedi Consular: Jedi that follow the path of the consular are skilled negotiators and talented ambassadors.
Jedi Guardian: Jedi that follow the path of the guardian are more combat-oriented than other Jedi, honing their skills to become deadly combatants.
Jedi Sentinel: The Jedi that follow the path of the sentinel are the true enemies of The Dark Side, hunting down evil and stopping the spread of darkness wherever they go.
Leadership: A born leader, you know how to change and lead your companions and followers to success.
Lightsaber Combat: The Lightsaber is the chosen weapon of the Jedi. Not as clumsy or random as a blaster, the Lightsaber is an elegant weapon for a more civilized combatant.
Lightsaber Forms: You have refined your knowledge of Lightsaber technique, your blade becoming an extension of yourself.
Lineage: You lead a privileged life and reap the benefit of an upbringing beyond most citizens of the galaxy.
Mastermind: You have the ability to attract loyal minions and are skilled at redirecting allies on the battlefield.
Military Tactics: You are an expert at leading troops into battle and using the battlefield to your advantage.
Misfortune: Your mother always said you were trouble. Now your enemies know it, too.
Sith: The Sith believes in order through tyranny, conspiring to annihilate The Jedi and everything they stand for.
Slicer: You move like a ghost through The HoloNet and can hack into enemy mainframes and computer systems with astonishing grace.
Spacer: You pron the space lanes seeking wealth, fame, adventure, or something more. You're also pretty good with Vehicles in general.
Survivor: As an explorer of dangerous places, you are trained to react to danger swiftly and adroitly, as well as navigate difficult terrain and reduce damage.
Weapon Master: You are skilled at wielding a variety of weapons and can wield choice Weapons with deadly precision and force.
Weapon Specialist: You are highly trained at using specific weapons.
Naval Officer: You are skilled at commanding Starships and small fleets.
Outlaw Tech: Scoundrels learn a variety of tricks that allow them to squeeze more life out of ailing technology, enhancing their gear in ways the manufacturer never intended.
Squadron Leader: You are an expert at leading a squadron of smaller Vehicles into combat as a unit.
Malkite Poisoner: You can employ a wide array of lethal toxins with which you can quickly and efficiently destroy your targets.
Master of Ter채s K채si: Ter채s K채si is a powerful and deadly martial arts form that enables its wielder to deal devastating amounts of Unarmed damage.
Corporate Power: You are an extension of your corporation and wield their power as your own.
Fencing: In the days of The Old Republic, a particular style arose mixing martial precision with forceful panache.
Gladiatorial Combat: You have learned the tricks of fighting in the gladiatorial arena, using a specialized combination of combat and showmanship.
Hyperspace Explorer: You are an experienced deep-space explorer who has learned a few tricks along the way that help you survive both in space and planet-side.
Jedi Battlemaster: Jedi Battlemasters are highly trained in Jedi combat techniques, serving combat trainers for Jedi Organizations and as Jedi commanders on the battlefield.
Jedi Shadow: Jedi Shadows are often elite Jedi Sentinels who specialize in abilities that aid them in pursuing Dark Side users in all forms and locations.
Jedi Watchman: Jedi Watchmen are elite Jedi tasked with protecting and watching over a specific world or region of space; many beginning as Jedi Consulars.
Mandalorian Warrior: The Mandalorians are talented and ferocious warriors. Their skillful training, warrior culture, and advanced combat abilities make them formidable foes.
Melee Duelist: You are lethal when fighting with one or more melee Weapons.
Rocket Jumper: You are an expert in the use of Jet Packs. You can use this form of transport to perform specialized aerial assaults and maneuvers.
Run and Gun: Scoundrels find ways to slip through fights of any size, even when the odds are against them.
Advanced Medicine: You are highly trained in medical procedures for all conditions.
Autonomy: You are able to resist any attempts to curb your independence and can fight back against anyone that tries to suppress your personality.
Bothan SpyNet: You are trained to work within the famed Bothan SpyNet.
Critical Master: Some Elite Troopers know exactly where to strike their foes to deal maximum damage, potentially crippling their enemies in the process.
Enforcement: You are a trained investigator who can locate and apprehend a quarry with exceptional speed and prowess.
Ideologue: Your zeal and dedication to your cause is inspirational. It motivates your allies and demoralizes your enemies.
Imperial Inquisitor: Trained to hunt down and destroy the remaining Jedi whenever they are found, Imperial Inquisitors are steeped in the lore of The Dark Side.
Infiltration: You are trained to secretly infiltrate enemy strongholds and organizations by force or by guile.
Mercenary: Mercenaries are blasters-for-hire who sell their services to the highest bidder. Few types of Soldiers are more capable of operating independently.
Privateer: You are a veteran of privateering and have learned the secrets of fighting aboard Starships.
Sabotage: You are skilled at improvising Weapons, handling Explosives, and disrupting the enemy.
Smuggling: Smuggling is part skill, part talent, part luck. The most notorious smugglers in the galaxy get along by making use of their quick wits and savvy.
Specialized Droid: You have become more specialized than other Droids of the same or a similar model.
Spy: Scouts are often capable of getting into areas unseen, and they make excellent spies thanks to their survival instincts and aptitude for stealth.
Turret: You can construct small, disposable, automated turrets.
Assassin: If ever caught in a straightforward fight, the odds are you are not going to make it, so your best move is to fight dirty and use every trick at your disposal.
Blockade Runner: One of the most valued skills a pilot on the fringe can have is the ability to blast past the authorities and not get caught.
Disgrace: Scandal fouls your family name, forcing you to live among the fringes of society and teaching you that honor is overrated when victory is on the line.
Gand Findsman: The Gand Findsmen are an ancient order of Force-sensitive Bounty Hunters that interpret signs and portents.
GenoHaradan: Members of The GenoHaradan are skilled not only in performing assassinations but also in manipulating others.
Outlaw: As an Outlaw, you live under a shadow, and everywhere you go, any time you reveal yourself, you risk being noticed and captured.
Piracy: You use devious tactics to capture ships and victims intact.
Pistoleer: You are a master of wielding two Pistols at the same time, and can use both Pistols simultaneously in unusual ways.
Trickery: Charlatans are masters of misdirection, confusion, and trickery.
Collaborator: Some Nobles learn to work both sides of the conflict in war and can manipulate their enemies into believing they are allies.
Droid Commander: You have learned the quirks and intricacies of commanding Droids, and you can get the most out of even the least sophisticated basic programming.
Jedi Archivist: You have dedicated your life as a Jedi to preserving knowledge and applying it in times when it is needed.
Jedi Healer: You have focused your natural ability with The Force to heal the sick and injured.
Loyal Protector: As a result of your station, occupation, or even just your natural charisma, you can attract one or more faithful Followers who protect you from harm.
Melee Specialist: Your skill with hand-to-hand combat is unmatched, and you can wield weapons with lethal accuracy and power.
Military Engineer: You have become skilled at using and manipulating technology on the battlefield. In fact, your fellows rely on your technical expertise in the heat of battle.
Opportunist: Profiteers, gunrunners, and privateers can use the chaos of war to make a tidy profit, and you are no exception.
Reconnaissance: You have learned to work well in concert with a team to provide the best reconnaissance and cover as much ground as possible.
Republic Commando: You have demonstrated that you are a highly skilled and capable soldier for the Republic and work well in a commando squad.
Squad Leader: You are a capable military leader who can issue orders to a squad of soldiers with poise and efficiency.
Surveillance: You have mastered the art of surveillance, transforming the information you gather with scouting into a distinct advantage on the battlefield.
Trooper: In war, soldiers stand side by side against deadly foes, and you have learned how to keep yourself and your comrades alive in battle.
Vanguard: As an expert in the art of scouting enemy formations, you are a valuable asset to any military force.
Brute Squad: Your brutal fighting techniques give you an upper hand when operating in small groups.
Carbineer: Many gunslingers choose to specialize in long arms, especially Blaster Carbines.
Force Hunter: Hunting Jedi is big business during The Legacy Era, and are among the most dangerous prey for Bounty Hunters to pursue.
Fugitive Commander: When a fighting force is outmanned, outgunned, and constantly on the run, only the skill and acumen of talented officers can keep prevent defeat.
Implant: Some Shapers develop implants that can be placed quickly and easily, temporarily boosting the physical prowess of their beneficiaries.
Jedi Refugee: In The Legacy Era, The Jedi are once again hunted to near-extinction and must learn to conceal their Force Powers and blend in.
Knight's Armor: You are a skilled master of The Force who knows how to get the most out of your Armor.
Knight's Resolve: You have dedicated your life to serving the rightful Emperor, and your devotion knows no bounds.
Protection: You are specially trained to protect those around you, either by taking the brunt of attacks that are aimed at them, or by defusing dangerous situations.
Provocateur: As a provocateur, you specialize in turning your enemies against one another, giving your allies the advantage through careful use of deception.
Shaper: You manipulate Yuuzhan Vong Biotech in new ways, molding it to your own ends and making it more effective.
Sith Commander: The Sith use terror to lead their troops, and Sith commanders have few compunctions about making examples of underlings.
Versatility: You are known for your ability to adapt to any situation, heedless of adversity.
Yuuzhan Vong Biotech: Yuuzhan Vong Biotechnology remains available in some parts of the galaxy, although its legally dubious. You have become specialized in its manipulation.
Beastwarden: You have learned to use The Force to touch the minds of the Beasts, soothing them and convincing them to do your bidding.
Jedi Artisan: You have dedicated yourself to the art of creation, learning how to craft Weapons and other items used by the Jedi with exquisite detail.
Jedi Instructor: The role of teacher is vital to the success and strength of The Jedi Order, and you excel at the art of instruction.
Jedi Investigator: You are one of The Jedi Order's most trusted investigators, tasked with ferreting out truth through a combination of detective work and Force divination.
Jedi Weapon Master: You have learned to use The Force to master a variety of weapons, and have expanded your martial prowess to cover more than just Lightsabers.
Mystic: You have studied The Force in a radically different way from other Force-users, relying on rituals and mystic lore to harness its power.
Sith Alchemy: You have learned the alchemical arts of the ancient Sith Lords and can fill objects and creatures with the power of The Dark Side.
Telepath: You have mastered the art of mental manipulation, using The Force to touch, read, and affect the minds of others with ease.
Ambusher: You specialize in springing ambushes on your enemies.
Gambling Leader: You aren't afraid to take chances when leading your allies, and you risk defeat in exchange for a shot at even the most unlikely victories.
Improviser: You can build what you need on the fly, and sometimes your customized gear proves more useful than what you otherwise might have purchased.
Pathfinder: You specialize in finding and creating optimal locations from which your allies can fight, and then making sure that they reach those locales safely.
Procurement: You know how to find just what you need, no matter how far you are from civilization or how rare the item is.
Rebel Recruiter: You have learned that many enemies can be considered potential allies instead, recognizing the telltale signs of a potential ally.
Recklessness: Others call you reckless, but you know that great rewards come only from taking chances, even if they could be deadly.
Unpredictable: You make it difficult for enemies to harm you because you're never in the place where they expect you to be.
Wingman: You are adept at flying in tight formations with your allies, working together with them to achieve your goals and using your Vehicle to shield others from harm.
Advance Patrol: Your skills at observation and stealth are frequently called upon as you gather information about enemy forces.
Anticipation: You have studied the ways of your enemies and have learned how to read the actions and thoughts of others, anticipating their every move.
Brigand: You use your experience operating on the wrong side of the law to give you an advantage in a fight, fair or otherwise.
Martial Arts Forms: You have advanced training in one or more martial art forms, turning your body into a lethal weapon.
Sharpshooter: You are an expert at long-range combat, using the inherent advantage of a Rifle to win the day.
Shockboxer: You are trained in the Shockboxing fighting style and can use your fists to devastate your enemies.
Unarmed Mastery: You have advanced training in one or more martial art form and have turned your body into a lethal weapon.
Veteran: You have been from one side of the galaxy to the other and have fought on more planets than most people visit in a lifetime.
Elite Droid: You have become a highly advanced Droid and are among the elite units of your class.
Override: You can take direct control over your Droid allies for brief periods.
Espionage: You use your knowledge of stealth and survival to make yourself a master of espionage and a valuable resource for those who wish to keep their hands clean.
Master of Intrigue: You are a skilled manipulator and have mastered the art of working behind the scenes to accomplish your goals.
Revolutionary: You seek to overthrow the system and are adept at being a monkey wrench in the cogs of society, but often at the cost of others' rights, freedoms, and lives.
Skill Challenge: You excel at complex tasks and are always called upon when your allies need something done quickly and done right.
Superior Skills: You're not just good at what you do, you're the best. Failure is but a stumbling block, and great success always follows.
Exile: You have broken with your family, world, or organization, adapting in new ways to the galaxy at large.
Master Scout: You are more experienced and talented than the average Scout. You draw upon your diverse abilities to gain advantages others cannot match.
Mobile Scout: Always mobile, Scouts have developed ways to ride and drive over all types of terrain.
Outsider: By blurring the line between lawful and lawless, Scoundrels operate outside social and cultural norms, learning to make the most of their positions.
Warrior: Warriors draw upon their natural aggressiveness, powerful bodies, and fighting abilities to defeat their enemies.
